login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access Imagor Studio
login.loginFailed: Invalid username or password. Please try again.

validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 30 characters

embedded.tokenMissing: Missing authentication token. Embedded mode requires a JWT token in the URL. Expected format: /?token=YOUR_JWT_TOKEN&path=image.jpg
embedded.tokenInvalid: Invalid or expired authentication token. Please check your JWT token and try again.
embedded.authenticationFailed: Embedded authentication failed. Please verify your token is valid and has not expired.
embedded.pathMissing: Path parameter is required. Expected format: /?token=YOUR_JWT_TOKEN&path=image.jpg
embedded.pathInvalid: Invalid path format. Expected: gallery/folder/image.jpg or image.jpg

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{min}} characters
validation.displayNameMinLength: Display name must be at least 3 characters long
validation.displayNameMaxLength: Display name must be less than 100 characters
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 30 characters
validation.usernamePattern: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.passwordMaxLength: Password must be less than 72 characters
validation.confirmPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.confirmPasswordMaxLength: Password must be less than 72 characters

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.selectFolderDescription: Choose a folder from the tree below.
gallery.dragAndDropHint: Drag and drop files here to upload them to your gallery

createFolder.title: Create New Folder
createFolder.description: Enter a name for the new folder.

dropZone.releaseToAdd: Release to add files to your gallery

copyUrlDialog.title: Copy URL
copyUrlDialog.description: Copy the URL below. We attempted to copy it automatically, but you may need to copy it manually.

deleteImage.title: Delete Image
deleteImage.description: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{imageName}}</1>?

deleteFolder.title: Delete Folder
deleteFolder.description: Are you sure you want to delete <1>{{folderName}}</1>?

file.title: Rename File
file.description: Enter a new name for this file.

folder.title: Rename Folder
folder.description: Enter a new name for this folder.

renameItem.fileExists: Cannot rename: A file or folder with this name already exists

errors.alreadyExists: A {{type}} with this name already exists

moveItems.title: Move Items
moveItems.selectDestinationDescription: Choose where to move the selected items.
moveItems.fileExists: Cannot move: A file or folder with this name already exists at the destination
moveItems.cannotMoveToSelf: Cannot move a folder into itself
moveItems.cannotMoveToSubfolder: Cannot move a folder into its own subfolder

dragDrop.fileExists: Cannot move: A file or folder with this name already exists at the destination

bulkDelete.title: Delete Selected Items
bulkDelete.description_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} item?
bulkDelete.description_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} items?

profile.title: Profile
profile.securitySettingsDescription: Manage your account security and password.
profile.changePasswordDescription: Enter your current password and choose a new one.
profile.usernameAlreadyInUse: This username is already in use

admin.title: Admin

systemSettings.title: System Settings
systemSettings.description: Configure system-wide settings. These options are only available to administrators.

homeTitle.label: Home Title
homeTitle.description: Customize the title shown for the home page in navigation and breadcrumbs

defaultLanguage.label: Default Language
defaultLanguage.description: Set the default language for the application

guestMode.label: Guest Mode
guestMode.description: Allow users to browse the gallery without creating an account

defaultSorting.label: Default File Sorting
defaultSorting.description: Choose how files and folders are sorted by default

showFileNames.label: Show File Names
showFileNames.description: Display file names on image thumbnails in the gallery by default

imageExtensions.label: Image File Extensions
imageExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of image file extensions to show (e.g., .jpg,.png,.gif)

videoExtensions.label: Video File Extensions
videoExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of video file extensions to show (e.g., .mp4,.webm,.avi)

videoThumbnailPosition.label: Video Thumbnail Position
videoThumbnailPosition.description: Choose where to extract video thumbnails. First frame is fastest. Seek options help get a more representative frame and avoid black frames.

showHidden.label: Show Hidden Files
showHidden.description: Show files and folders that start with a dot (.)

storage.title: Storage Configuration
storage.description: Manage where your images and files are stored. Changes may require a server restart.

admin.setupDescription: Let's get your image gallery set up in just a few steps
admin.guestModeDescription: Allow users to browse the gallery without creating an account
admin.homeTitleDescription: Customize the title displayed for the home/root folder in the gallery
admin.systemSettingsDescription: These settings can be changed later in admin panel
admin.storageDescription: Configure where your images will be stored
admin.storageConfiguredRestart: Storage configured successfully Please restart the server to apply changes.

storageTypeSelector.fileStorageDescription: Store images on the local file system
storageTypeSelector.s3StorageDescription: Store images in Amazon S3 or compatible cloud storage

storage.dirPermissionsDescription: Permissions for creating new directories (octal format, e.g., 0755)
storage.filePermissionsDescription: Permissions for writing new files (octal format, e.g., 0644)
storage.baseDirDescription: The directory where images will be stored on the file system
storage.bucketDescription: The name of your S3 bucket where images will be stored
storage.regionDescription: AWS region where your bucket is located (e.g., us-east-1, eu-west-1)
storage.customEndpointDescription: Custom S3 endpoint for S3-compatible services (leave empty for AWS S3)
storage.forcePathStyleDescription: Enable for MinIO and LocalStack. Most other S3-compatible services work better with this disabled.
storage.accessKeyIdDescription: AWS access key ID (leave empty to use IAM roles or environment variables)
storage.secretAccessKeyDescription: AWS secret access key (leave empty to use IAM roles or environment variables)
storage.sessionTokenDescription: AWS session token (only required for temporary credentials)
storage.baseDirectoryDescription: Optional prefix for all object keys in the bucket (e.g., "images/")
storage.testConfigurationFirst: Please fill in the {{storageType}} storage configuration first
storage.configurationSuccessRestart: Storage configured successfully. Please restart the server to apply changes.
storage.configurationOverridden: Storage configuration is managed by external configuration
storage.serverRestartMessage: Storage configuration changes will take effect after restarting the server.
storage.testConfigFirst: Please fill in the {{storageType}} storage configuration first

systemSettings.settingOverridden: This setting is overridden by configuration file or environment variable

imagor.imagorConfigurationDescription: Configure image processing settings. Imagor handles image transformations and optimizations.
imagor.selectModeDescription: Choose how Imagor will process your images
imagor.embeddedModeDescription: Run Imagor as part of this application (recommended for most users)
imagor.externalModeDescription: Connect to an external Imagor service (advanced configuration)
imagor.secretDescription: Optional secret key for signing image URLs. Leave empty to use the JWT secret.
imagor.externalSecretDescription: Secret key used by the external Imagor service for URL signing.
imagor.embeddedModeSimplified: Embedded mode uses fixed configuration with secure defaults. No additional configuration required.
imagor.baseUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://
imagor.baseUrlDescription: The base URL of your external Imagor service
imagor.unsafeModeDescription: Allow processing images without URL signing (not recommended for production)
imagor.signerTypeDescription: Hash algorithm used for URL signing
imagor.signerTruncateDescription: Number of characters to truncate from the signature (0 = no truncation)
imagor.configurationOverridden: Imagor configuration is managed by external configuration
imagor.configuredSuccessRestart: Imagor configured successfully Please restart the server to apply changes.
imagor.serverRestartDescription: Imagor configuration changes will take effect after restarting the server.
imagor.externalRequirement1: External imagor loader/storage must align with Imagor Studio storage settings
imagor.externalRequirement2: CORS must be enabled for metadata/EXIF access

license.licenseManagementDescription: Manage your Imagor Studio license and view license information.
license.configurationOverridden: License configuration is managed by external configuration
license.activationSuccess: Thank you for your support! License activated successfully.
license.updateSuccess: License updated successfully Thank you for your continued support.
license.updateDialogDescription: Enter a new license key to update your current license.
license.activateDialogDescription: Enter your license key to activate Imagor Studio.
license.newLicenseKeyDescription: Paste your new license key here. This will replace your current license.
license.licenseKeyDescription: Paste your license key here to activate Imagor Studio.
license.registerDescription: Enter your license key to activate Imagor Studio.
license.supportTitle: üíù Support Imagor Studio - from the creator of imagor
license.creatorStory: From vipsgen to imagor, I've built the entire image processing pipeline from the ground up. Imagor Studio is an image gallery and live editing web application that brings together years of ongoing development.

features.realTimeEditing: Live image editing with instant URL generation
features.zeroConfiguration: Zero-configuration setup with universal storage support
features.nonDestructive: Professional-grade image processing powered by imagor

license.supportOngoingDevelopment: Your support enables continued development of Imagor Studio.

users.title: Users
users.createUserDescription: Add a new user to the system. They will be able to log in with the provided credentials.
users.editUserDescription: Update user information. Changes will be applied immediately.
users.deactivateUserDescription: Are you sure you want to deactivate
users.deactivateUserWarning: This will prevent the user from logging in
users.reactivateUserWarning: This will allow the user to log in again
users.searchPlaceholder: Search users by name or username...

messages.usernameAlreadyExists: This username is already in use

filePicker.title: Select File
filePicker.description: Choose a file from your gallery
filePicker.noFiles: No files found in this folder

footerText: Built on top of {{uiLink}}. The source code is available on {{githubLink}}.

page.confirmLeaveMessage: Are you sure you want to go back?

modeDescriptions.fitIn: Resize to fit within dimensions, maintaining aspect ratio
modeDescriptions.fill: Resize and crop to fill dimensions exactly
modeDescriptions.stretch: Resize to exact dimensions, ignoring aspect ratio
modeDescriptions.smart: Smart crop to fill dimensions with content detection

output.formatDescription: Choose output format or keep original
output.qualityAutoOptimized: Quality will be automatically optimized to meet size limit
output.maxSizeDescription: Automatically adjusts quality to meet the target file size
output.targetSize: Target: {{size}} - Quality will be automatically reduced to meet this limit
output.metadataDescription: Remove color profiles and metadata to reduce file size

fillPadding.description: Add padding around the image and fill transparent or padded areas with a color

layers.title: Layers
layers.selectImageDescription: Choose an image to add as a new layer
